member.summary: Provides a mechanism for generating recurring events at specified intervals.

remarks.p: The Timer control requires javascript support in order to function.

member.name: P:MarkItUp.WebControls.Timer.ClientNotificationFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the custom client-side script to use for client-side event notifications.
member.remarks: Client-side event-handler that receives notifications for each Tick of the Timer.
member.example:
The following example shows you how to receive client-side notifications from the control.
<%@ Register TagPrefix="miu" Namespace="MarkItUp.WebControls" Assembly="MarkItUp.WebControls.Timer" %>
<form runat="server"> <miu:Timer id="MyTimer" runat="server" ClientNotificationFunction="ClientNotify" Interval="1000" MaxTicks="3" /> </form>
<script language="javascript"> function ClientNotify( source, arguments ) { window.status = arguments.TickCount + " of " + arguments.MaxTicks ; } </script>
